definition: to flow/to disseminate/to circulate or spread/to move or drift/to degenerate/to banish or send into exile/stream of water or sth resembling one/class, rate or grade

sentences.english: Methods Using the theorem of center manifold and bifurcation theory of planar system.
sentences.chinese: 方法利用中心流形定理並結合平面系統的分支理論。

sentences.english: First the model is subdivided into simple meshes that are orientable and manifold.
sentences.chinese: 有限元模型首先分解成一系列的可定向的流形模型。

sentences.english: The infinitesimal variations of submanifold with boundary were studied by means of integral formulas.
sentences.chinese: 本文利用積分公式研究了有邊界子流形的無窮小變差。

sentences.english: It enriches the NMM dynamic analysis methods.
sentences.chinese: 這豐富了數值流形方法的動力計算方法。

sentences.english: Usually the numerical manifold method(NMM) is based on meshes of three- or four-node element.
sentences.chinese: 數值流形方法常基於有限元法三結點或四結點單元。

sentences.english: Lie triple systems were introduced in connection with the symmetric space and the totally geodesic submanifold.
sentences.chinese: 李三系最初源於對稱空間及全測地子流形的研究。

sentences.english: The simplified array manifold based on approximate ideal subarray patterns was constructed.
sentences.chinese: 構造了基於近似理想子陣方向圖的簡化陣列流形。

sentences.english: By using the method of centre manifold, the stability of the Hopf bifurcations is also proven.
sentences.chinese: 利用中心流形約化方法證明了霍普夫分歧解的穩定性。
遞歸神經網絡微分流形方法。

sentences.english: Unique to Market Cavity provides for smaller size manifolds and less weight.
sentences.chinese: 獨特的市場腔爲更小的尺寸和重量輕流形。

sentences.english: In this paper we discuss actions of Lie groupoids and their infinitesimal actions on manifolds.
sentences.chinese: 討論了李羣胚在流形上的作用及其無窮小作用。

sentences.english: In this paper, We discuss the isospectrum problem of pseudo-umbilical submanifold with totally umbilical submanifold on the sphere.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論球面上僞臍子流形與全臍子流形的等譜問題。

sentences.english: In this paper, We discuss the isospectrum problem of pseudo-umbilical submanifold with totally umbilical submanifold on the sphere.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論球面上僞臍子流形與全臍子流形的等譜問題。

sentences.english: In this paper, the Submanifolds in two Nested spaces are discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文在特定條件下，討論了兩個嵌套空間中的子流形。

sentences.english: The Numerical Manifold Method (NMM) is one of important numerical methods to model rock mechanics problems at present.
sentences.chinese: 數值流形方法是目前岩石力學分析的主要方法之一。

sentences.english: Small and short cavity allows for large diameter cross drillings in the manifolds.
sentences.chinese: 小和短腔允許在大直徑鑽孔流形交叉。

definition: (math.) an analytic function (of a complex variable)
